rows.label: bf11670100_0010
rows.name:
I wonder if that's what they want.
To become a Divine Beast and live on with humans.

rows.label: bf11670100_0040
rows.name:
No... it's just, you're asking
the same thing you did back then.

rows.label: bf11670100_0060
rows.name: And I asked you, "What about you?".

rows.label: bf11670100_0070
rows.name: And what do you think your answer was?

rows.label: bf11670100_0090
rows.name:
I don't need eternity.
If this life can be with her... that's enough.

rows.label: bf11670100_0100
rows.name:
That's one way for a Blade to be.
No one can fault you for it.

rows.label: bf11670100_0120
rows.name: Well... maybe I was just like you.

rows.label: bf11670100_0150
rows.name: This way isn't so bad either.

rows.label: bf11670100_0160
rows.name:
After a few years, or a few centuries,
new relationships with people await.
